body.p: Starting with version 17.1 Oxygen adds support for some DITA 1.3 features. In order to enable DITA 1.3 support in Oxygen and use DITA Open Toolkit 2.1 for publishing you can go to the application Preferences->"DITA" page and choose ${frameworksDir}/dita/DITA-OT2.x as the main DITA OT folder.

Below you can see a list of DITA 1.3 features and their implementation status: DITA 1.3 features
Feature Editing Publishing
New file templates for create DITA 1.3 DTD, XML Schema and Relax NG-based topics/concepts/maps.... Implemented N/A
Validate and provide content completion for new DITA 1.3 elements Implemented N/A
Present annotations in the content completion window and tooltips for new DITA 1.3 elements Implemented N/A
Scoped keys support (define key scopes, allow keyrefs with specified keyscopes) Not implemented Not implemented
Branch filtering (create ditavalrefs) Implemented Not implemented
Shorthand to address element in the same topic Implemented Implemented
Troubleshooting specialization Implemented No special display for troubleshooting elements.
XML markup domain Implemented Implemented
Release management domain Implemented Not implemented
Equation and MathML domain (display and insert equation) Implemented Implemented
SVG domain (display referenced SVG) Implemented Implemented
Learning Object and Group maps Implemented Not implemented
Various table attributes (orientation, rotation, scope and headers on cells) Not implemented Not implemented
Div element Implemented Implemented
New Map Topicref attributes (cascade, deliveryTarget) Implemented Not implemented
